name: Revenge Of Olympus
description:
=== Revenge Of Olympus ===

This game was made in the Unity engine as a College assignment for my "Game Tools" module. For this assignment, I was required to submit a 2D game demonstrating my competence at level design in a 2D game engine.

Revenge of Olympus has been in development for 3 weeks and I might even come back to it in the future and make a full game.

Everything from scripts, to art and sound are all done by myself. This game took heavy inspiration from Kid Icarus on NES, so the snake and one-eyed monster sprites are 32x32 remakes that I did, as well as making a movement animation for them.

Here is the reference list of things in this project not created by me:

Music - The Unsolved Mystery

Font - Greek Font

Control Images - Keyboard and Controllers Prompts Pack

Snake and monster sprite - Kid Icarus Sprites
